Be carefull who you call a fool, Minime. There could be consecuences for 
getting me mad...

::Striker::

Striker groans, opening his eyes. His hand istinctively reaches up to hold 
his head, but is stopped by the bonds. Striker growls, looking around. He was 
in a cell, his feet and hands connected to the wall by chains.

"Beast mode," he mutters. Several seconds, a wolf stands in the cell, out of 
his bonds thanks to his thinner wolf limbs. He transforms to robot mode, 
doing an internal scan. All his weapons seemed disabled or gone, and his 
jetpack reported errors as well.

He sighs, his repair system begining to work on the disabled parts. There was 
no helping his lost gun, but his shoulder blasters and jetpack were a 
different story...
